General.Name: Shandong Binzhou Bohai Piston Co Ltd
General.Description: Bohai Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells pistons in China and internationally. Its pistons are used in passenger and commercial, engineering, marine, agriculture, general motor, and other vehicles. The company also offers aluminium, mono-forged-steel, laser remelting, and pressure casting pistons. The company was formerly known as Shandong Binzhou Bohai Piston Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bohai Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. in October 2017. Bohai Automotive Systems Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Binzhou, China.
